member.name: M:msa_phase_2_api.Controllers.PokemonController.GetPokemon(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the raw JSON consist of the searched pokemon
member.returns: A JSON object representing all the details on that pokemon available in PokeApi

member.name: M:msa_phase_2_api.Controllers.TeamController.CreateAsync(System.String,System.DateTime)
member.returns: Creates Team with given team name

member.name: M:msa_phase_2_api.Controllers.TeamController.UpdateAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.returns: Updates the team with given new pokemon with given old pokemon

member.name: M:msa_phase_2_api.Controllers.TeamController.Delete(System.String)
member.returns: Deletes the team of given id

member.name: T:msa_phase_2_api.Controllers.WeatherForecastController
member.summary: This is the weather forecast controller that comes as a default from the project template when creating a new c# Web API application.

member.name: M:msa_phase_2_api.Controllers.WeatherForecastController.Get
member.summary: This endpoint takes no arguments, and gives you the weather forecast
member.returns: A JSON object describing the weather forecast
